header.#text:
Clarification
			 of inventory rules for small business

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: (relating to general rule for inventories) is amended by redesignating
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 471 of the Internal Revenue Code of
			 1986

header.#text:
Small business
				taxpayers not required To use inventories

text.#text:
A qualified taxpayer
				shall not be required to use inventories under this section for a taxable
				year.

If a qualified taxpayer does not use
				inventories with respect to any property for any taxable year beginning after
				December 31, 2013, such property shall be treated as a material or supply which
				is not incidental.

text.#text:
The amendments made
			 by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31,
			 2013.

In the
			 case of any taxpayer changing the taxpayer’s method of accounting for any
			 taxable year under the amendments made by this section—

such change shall be treated as initiated
			 by the taxpayer;

such change shall be treated as made with
			 the consent of the Secretary of the Treasury; and
